properties.areaDesc: Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Sheep Range
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:20AM PST until February 10 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow above 5000 feet. Additional accumulations of 1 to 2
inches are possible through sunrise.  Winds gusting as high as
40 mph.

* WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and chain controls.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING ABOVE 5000 FEET
